title: 176 -Zito: The Bear King
description: Today’s episode features a full crew as Ty Schmit stears this fully loaded ship on this beautiful Friday. The boys all preview their weekends which doesn’t last long, as uncle COVID has began to run rapid again in the streets. The boys jump right into the Pod FOD which is a folder compiled of all things around the internet. Today’s FOD includes The boys deciding their favorite sports movies, a look at the upcoming Monica Lewinsky inspired American Crime doc, Mission Impossible 7 stunts and much much more. Make sure to subscribe to youtube.come/thepodpmi to watch full episodes and don't forget to send your submissions for the Pod FOD to @ThePodPMI on twitter and instagram. We appreciate you rocking with us and we'll see you Wednesday, Cheers.
